00026 #define wchar2char(wchar2char_pwchar_source) \
00027     const size_t wchar2char_Length=wcstombs(NULL,wchar2char_pwchar_source,0)+1; \
00028     char *wchar2char_pchar = (char *)_alloca(wchar2char_Length);; /* ";;" is needed to fix a compiler bug */ \
00029     wcstombs(wchar2char_pchar,wchar2char_pwchar_source,wchar2char_Length);
